entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as having enthusiasm when he sees Muggles going about their daily business. He whispers to Harry that the automatic ticket machines are 'Simply fabulous' and 'Wonderfully ingenious'. This shows his excitement and admiration for Muggle technology.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being with Mr. Weasley in London. He points out that the automatic ticket machines are out of order and handles the transaction to buy tickets from a guard.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley and Harry are traveling together on the Underground train, with Mr. Weasley anxiously checking the map above the windows.
